sentences.english: Parting with you, want to say far more than kilowatts.
sentences.chinese: 与你们离别时，想说的话何止万千。

sentences.english: I don't dislike him. I hate his guts.
sentences.chinese: 我何止是不喜欢他，而是恨透了他。

sentences.english: The uses of coal are by no means limited to those.
In serious drought, countless animals die from thirst on the grasslands because of no water.
sentences.chinese: 大旱之时，草原上因无水可饮而渴死的动物何止万千。

sentences.english: This is the story, the entanglement , there are far more than what we understand.
sentences.chinese: 这故事中，所纠缠的，有何止是我们所理解的爱情。

sentences.english: Their progress was exasperatingly slow, but we were beyond exasperation.
sentences.chinese: 车速很慢，令人恼怒，但我们何止是恼怒呢。

sentences.english: The reality is far from what they boast.
sentences.chinese: 现实与他们吹嘘的相差何止十万八千里。

sentences.english: I was more than surprised; I was astonished.
sentences.chinese: 我何止惊奇，简直是大吃一惊。

sentences.english: This is not only shocking, but also very painful.
This is the first interview in a series entitled The Many Paths to Translation Work.
sentences.chinese: 这是系列采访《翻译之路，何止一条》的第一篇。

sentences.english: Actually, aging is worse than a mistake, it is a catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 其实，老化何止是一个错误，更是一个灾难。

sentences.english: But the surge was more than just the 30, 000 or so additional soldiers and marines who were deployed.
sentences.chinese: 可是因它部署的士兵及海军陆战队员追加了何止3万。

definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
as many as/no less than/not inferior to/as good as/on a par with
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
